lead_paragraph: BENNETT--William. Sometimes words cannot express a loss, measure a life, or convey how much one person has given us. We, his colleagues at the Saltaire Volunteer Fire Company, grieve our dear friend, Will Bennett. But his spirit remains, cherished and kept safe in the hearts of those who knew and loved him. A memorial service for Will Bennett will be held Thursday, November 6, 2014, at the Church of the Heavenly Rest, 2 East 90th Street (corner of 5th Avenue). In lieu of flowers the family requests that donations in Will's name be sent to: Saltaire Volunteer Fire Company, PO Box 5375, Bay Shore, NY 11706. Hugh O'Brien, President James Rieger, Chief
